commands.name: create-calendar-event-from-url
commands.title: Create Calendar Event / Reminder from URL
commands.subtitle: Paste URL to receive a calendar event or reminder
commands.description: Seamlessly convert URLs into calendar events or reminders. When you paste a URL containing event information, this feature extracts the relevant details and generates a calendar event or reminder. It's perfect for quickly adding webinars, online meetings, or any event linked online to your calendar, ensuring you never miss out on important events.

commands.name: create-calendar-event-from-text
commands.title: Create Calendar Event / Reminder from Text
commands.subtitle: Paste text to receive a calendar event or reminder
commands.description: Transform any text into a calendar event or reminder with ease. Simply paste text containing event details, such as date, time, and location, and this feature will automatically create a calendar event or reminder for you. It's an efficient way to organize meetings and appointments directly from your clipboard, saving you time and ensuring you stay on top of your schedule.

commands.name: create-calendar-event-from-image
commands.title: Create Calendar Event / Reminder from Image
commands.subtitle: Process image to receive a calendar event or reminder
commands.description: Extract event details or reminders from images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF). Processes images from clipboard or file picker. Perfect for concert posters, event flyers, and screenshots.
